name: Pokécheck PastelBlue (light)
description:
Pokécheck is a website which allows you to upload your Pokémon to the Internet for viewing their stats and sharing with others. This is a light blue skin made by request of Pokécheck user ShinyIce.

All versions are now up to 2.8, which will be the precursor to an all-themes-included version 3.0.

There are three remixes available: style 59654, style 59703, and style 59704.
additional_info:
2.8 - Cleanup, added account options
1.0 - Initial release (remix from TrueBlue DARK 2.23)

CSS code is © M.andrew 2012. You may modify the theme for personal use and distribute it (or derivative works), but you may not charge payment for these works.
